description: Mercury and Argus and Perseus and Medusa; Produced in the Doccia Porcelain Factory (Italian, about 1735 - 1896), After models by Giovanni Battista Foggini (Italian, 1652 - 1725), Probably made by Gaspero Bruschi (Italian, 1701 - 1780), et al; Doccia (near Florence), Italy; about 1750; Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration, gilding; 94.SE.76; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
